characters: Driver of a white sedan, person on a scooter
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. Ahead, a white sedan is moving steadily. On the right side, a person on a scooter is approaching the intersection. The scooter moves closer to the self-driving vehicles lane, potentially causing a dangerous situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while keeping a safe distance from the white sedan ahead. The vehicle is also monitoring the scooter on the right side, which is moving closer to the lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Right: A person on a scooter, approximately 5 meters away, approaching the intersection and moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane.
